content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, thank you for your interest in renting my apartment. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I believe that a monthly rental price of 1,200 Euros would be fair.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 1,200 Euros. Thank you for your time and consideration. I will make the payment on time and will be a responsible tenant.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for agreeing to the rental price of 1,200 Euros, Ryanah. I am glad to hear that you will be a responsible tenant and make timely payments. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns before signing the lease agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have no questions or concerns. I would like to sign the lease agreement as soon as possible. Can you provide me with a copy of the agreement?

I will pay the first month's rent of 1,200 Euros on the 1st of next month.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Certainly, Ryanah. I will prepare a lease agreement for you to review and sign. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about the agreement.

Regarding the first month's rent, I will send you a payment request on the 1st of next month. Please make the payment as soon as possible to secure your tenancy.
name: Heinrich Heine
